# Amigo Secreto Documentation

This wiki documents a web-based Secret Santa (Amigo Secreto) application built with React and Firebase. The application enables users to create and participate in gift exchange events with secure phone-based authentication.

pages.purpose: Introduce the Amigo Secreto (Secret Santa) application, its purpose, key features, and technology stack
